---

_The Keep_ represents steadfastness and being unshakable to threats. As long as _The Keep_ is invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects. Whenever you become [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), reduce the condition value by 1 (to a minimum of 0). If you are 20th level, the item bonus increases to +3.
